chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
lq: Ordered.sort Label
lc: Ordered.sort Label
cn: nid
pts: seq nid
Lab_neq: is_true (lq != lc)
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
Puniq: is_true (uniq pts)
PtsNonEmpty: is_true (pts != [::])
serialize: Data -> seq nat
deserialize: seq nat -> Data
ds_inverse: left_inverse serialize deserialize
s: state
d: Data
n: Equality.sort nat_eqType

Goal:
Coh W s -> n \in qnodes -> local_indicator d (loc_tpc s) -> core_state_to_data n (loc_tpc' s n) d

Premises:
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom (cT:=union_mapUMC Label protocol) w.1 =i dom (cT:=union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
Module Ordered := Struct Record mixin_of (T : Equality.Exports.eqType) : Type := Mixin { ordering : rel T; _ : irreflexive (T:=T) ordering; _ : transitive (T:=T) ordering; _ : forall x y : T, [|| ordering x y, x == y | ordering y x] } Definition ordering : forall T : Equality.Exports.eqType, mixin_of T -> rel T. Record class_of (T : Type) : Type := Class { base : Equality.mixin_of T; mixin : mixin_of (EqType T base) } Definition base : forall T : Type, class_of T -> Equality.mixin_of T. Definition mixin : forall (
qnodes = cn :: pts : seq nid
uniq = fun T : eqType => fix uniq (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => (x \notin s') && uniq s' end : forall T : eqType, seq T -> bool Arguments uniq {T} _%seq_scope
Notation loc_tpc s := (loc_tpc' s cn)
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Notation seq := list
local_indicator = fun d : Data => [Pred h | h = st :-> (d.1, CInit) \+ log :-> d.2] : Data -> Simpl_Pred (union_map_classPCM heapUMC)
W = QueryHooked.W lq pc Data qnodes serialize core_state_to_data : world
Module Equality := Struct Definition block : forall A : Type, A -> A. Parameter JMeq_eq_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A), JMeq_eq JMeq_refl = erefl x. Parameter UIP_refl_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A), UIP_refl A x (erefl x) = erefl (erefl x). Parameter inj_pairT2_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (P : A -> Type) (p : P x), inj_pairT2 A P x p p (erefl (existT P x p)) = erefl p. Record DependentEliminationPackage (A : Type)
Notation loc_tpc' s n := (getLc s n)
left_inverse = fun (A B : Type) (op : A -> B) (inv : B -> A) => forall x : A, inv (op x) = x : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> (B -> A) -> Prop Arguments left_inverse {A B}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope
core_state_to_data = fun (n : nat_eqType) (h : union_map_classPCM heapUMC) (d : Data) => if n == cn then h = st :-> (d.1, CInit) \+ log :-> d.2 else h = st :-> (d.1, PInit) \+ log :-> d.2 : nat_eqType -> union_map_classPCM heapUMC -> Data -> Prop
Data = (nat * Log)%type : Type
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion

TPCProtocol.tpc_coh = fun (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (d : dstatelet) => [/\ TPCProtocol.soupCoh cn pts (dsoup d), dom (cT:=union_mapUMC [ordType of nid] heap) (dstate d) =i TPCProtocol.nodes cn pts others, valid (dstate d) & forall n : nat_eqType, n \in TPCProtocol.nodes cn pts others -> TPCProtocol.localCoh cn pts n (getLocal n d)] : nid -> seq nid -> seq nid -> dstatelet -> Prop Arguments TPCProtocol.tpc_coh _ (_ _)%seq_scope
